Source.Name: praat
Source.Summary: A software package for the scientific analysis of speech in phonetics
Source.Description: Praat is a speech analysis tool used for doing phonetics by computer. Praat can analyse, synthesize, and manipulate speech, and create high-quality pictures for your publications.

Package.Name: praat
Package.Summary: A software package for the scientific analysis of speech in phonetics
Package.Description: Praat is a speech analysis tool used for doing phonetics by computer. Praat can analyse, synthesize, and manipulate speech, and create high-quality pictures for your publications.
